articles.title: Meta launches new California PAC to back pro-AI political candidates
articles.summary: Meta launched a new Super PAC in California to support political candidates who back pro-artificial intelligence policies and oppose strict regulation.
articles.translated_title: Meta launches new California PAC to back pro-AI political candidates
articles.translated_summary: Meta launched a new Super PAC in California to support political candidates who back pro-artificial intelligence policies and oppose strict regulation.

articles.title: Anthropic reaches a settlement over authors' class-action piracy lawsuit
articles.summary: The move means the company will avoid a potentially more costly ruling if the case regarding its use of copyright materials to train artificial intelligence tools had moved forward.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic reaches a settlement over authors' class-action piracy lawsuit
articles.translated_summary: The move means the company will avoid a potentially more costly ruling if the case regarding its use of copyright materials to train artificial intelligence tools had moved forward.

articles.title: Here’s what we know (and don’t know) about AI and jobs
articles.summary: A report out of MIT last week claimed that 95 percent of companies had wasted money with failed projects relying on generative artificial intelligence apps. Someone should have read the fine print.
articles.translated_title: Here’s what we know (and don’t know) about AI and jobs
articles.translated_summary: A report out of MIT last week claimed that 95 percent of companies had wasted money with failed projects relying on generative artificial intelligence apps. Someone should have read the fine print.

articles.title: Google’s Gemini AI Gets Major Image Editing Update: Nano Banana
articles.summary: Google has improved the image editing features of the Gemini artificial intelligence-powered chatbot via a major update. Read more...
articles.translated_title: Google’s Gemini AI Gets Major Image Editing Update: Nano Banana

articles.title: AI technology develops rapidly as experts debate benefits and risks
articles.summary: Tech executives express mixed views on the future impact of artificial intelligence, with concerns about job displacement balanced against potential benefits for society.
articles.translated_title: AI technology develops rapidly as experts debate benefits and risks
articles.translated_summary: Tech executives express mixed views on the future impact of artificial intelligence, with concerns about job displacement balanced against potential benefits for society.

articles.title: OpenAI, Altman sued over ChatGPT's role in California teen's suicide
articles.summary: The parents of a teen who died by suicide after ChatGPT coached him on methods of self harm sued OpenAI and CEO Sam Altman on Tuesday, saying the company knowingly put profit above safety when it launched the GPT-4o version of its artificial intelligence chatbot last year.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI, Altman sued over ChatGPT's role in California teen's suicide
articles.translated_summary: The parents of a teen who died by suicide after ChatGPT coached him on methods of self harm sued OpenAI and CEO Sam Altman on Tuesday, saying the company knowingly put profit above safety when it launched the GPT-4o version of its artificial intelligence chatbot last year.

articles.title: Anthropic settles class action from US authors alleging copyright infringement
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic said in a court filing on Tuesday it had settled a class action lawsuit from a group of U.S. authors who argued the company's AI training infringed their copyrights.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic settles class action from US authors alleging copyright infringement
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic said in a court filing on Tuesday it had settled a class action lawsuit from a group of U.S. authors who argued the company's AI training infringed their copyrights.

articles.title: Musk's xAI sues Apple and OpenAI for alleged AI conspiracy lawsuit
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI sued Apple and OpenAI in federal court, alleging the companies conspired to prevent competition in the market for artificial intelligence tools.
articles.translated_title: Musk's xAI sues Apple and OpenAI for alleged AI conspiracy lawsuit
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk's xAI sued Apple and OpenAI in federal court, alleging the companies conspired to prevent competition in the market for artificial intelligence tools.

articles.title: Melania Trump announces K-12 school AI challenge
articles.summary: First lady Melania Trump announced a new Presidential Artificial Intelligence Challenge Tuesday, inviting K-12 students and educators to participate.

articles.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Was Dubbed 'Godfather of AI.' The Company Is Betting On These AI Stocks
articles.summary: Nvidia, the chipmaking giant at the center of the artificial intelligence revolution, has AI stock bets of its own. Here's where its putting its money.
